author: kasini3000
body:
How to run powershell in chrome or edge？create Chrome Extension project?
Is there has Chrome Extension to do this?
Just like vbscript in IE
Or Who is interested in this matter?

I heard Windows Admin Center has a web powershell console. Can the extension of WAC handle HTML view?

## Expected features:
 You can develop mvc view functions through powershell code for HTML, for example:
```
<script Language="powershell">
xxx
</script>
```
 Work through a browser plug-in, or work through a Windows Admin Center extension.
 call javascript in powershell code.
 The powershell statement should be executed in a separate child process.
title: Is anyone interested in the powershell browser plug-in project?  like vbscript in ie
